attributes.review: this app is misleading and it is spreading slander and propaganda. it MUST be removed from the app store. it is very offensive and Donald J Trump is a terrible person based on my experience with this app. DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: Soooo many bugs, legit I think they sent bugs TO MY HOUSE to try and get me to vote for trump, couldn’t even use the app I was too busy spraying myself with bug spray.

attributes.review: it is absolutely disgusting! what the app stands for is revolting! it condones being homophobic, transphobic, islamophobic, misogynistic and racist. america doesn’t need that negativity. it is insulting to everyone who isn’t white. the guy it is for can’t even form a full sentence and has the same iq as a table. no one deserves to go on that app and be insulted by a man the color of a cheeto. the app is absolutely mortifying!!
attributes.title: awful app
